## One Sample Inference 

$Y_i \sim  i.i.d. N(\mu, \sigma^2)$

i.i.d. standards for "independent and identically distributed"

Hence, we have the following model:
$Y_i=\mu +\epsilon_i$ where $\epsilon_i \sim{iid}$
